This exception appear due to the problem with saving cursor position in editor. 
E.g. to reproduce it:
- create new java class & save it.
- Position cursor in text editor to the last line in this class
- From external editor remove several lines from this class
- Invoke "refresh from local" -> Exception appears.

Couldn't reproduce in I-20020205. The problem alext describes would be related 
to bug# 6926 which has been resolved. Need a better scenario in order to 
reproduce misbehavior.
